title: Advice to batchelors, or, The married mans lamentation. Take heed you that unmarried are, how you do make your choice; but if a good wife you do find, 'twill make your heart rejoyce. Tune of, Hey boys up go we; Busie fame; Marrellus; or, Jenny Gin.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed for J. Deacon, at the Angel in Guildspur=street, without Newgate,
